channel.title: W3C Web Authentication Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Authentication Working Group

item.title: [webauthn-3] Webauthn latest specs
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PublicKeyCredential

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Static methods

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

There are new capabilities and methods available according to Web Authentication:
An API for accessing Public Key Credentials
Level 3, for example getClientCapabilities static method on PublicKeyCredentials (https://w3c.github.io/webauthn/#sctn-getClientCapabilities, added in w3c/webauthn#1923) that are absent from the docs.

What did you expect to see?

I would expect the new parts of the specs to be documented to the PublicKeyCredential page.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

https://w3c.github.io/webauthn/#sctn-getClientCapabilities for example, there are more things that were recently updated that should also be reflected in the docs.

Do you have anything more you want to share?

I am happy to contribute but first wanted to check if there's maybe a reason for the page to not be up to date yet.
